channel.title: James Rajotte
channel.description: Recent news about James Rajotte, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Looking forward to touring the Enform Nisku Training Facility with @KellieLeitch this morning. #cdnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great to see that our government is taking steps to build a stronger immigration system and address our labour needs: http://t.co/KdAO6fiZWD

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Looking forward to playing on “Team Zalpe” with @ZacDalpe22 tonight in Hockey Night in Brantford: http://t.co/y5ePaLOCMr

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Was happy to join @Phil4Brant at the Brantford Sunrise Rotary meeting this morning bringing an overview of the budgetary process. #cdnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Can't wait 2 take part! MT @Phil4Brant: Hockey Night in Brantford is fast approaching! Get tickets 2day 2 see your favourite hockey stars!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Wishing my good friend & colleague Merv Tweed all the best in the next chapter of his life. You will be missed on Parliament Hill #cdnpoli

item.title: Mentioned by CTV News
item.description:
Backbenched: Once again, James Rajotte's phone did not ring
When it came time for his Harper liftoff loyalty to be rewarded in 2006 with a cabinet gig by the Prime Minister he helped convince to re-enter politics, Edmonton MP James Rajotte was inexplicably left on the backbench. The oversight had insiders puzzled and ...
